text: [[b]]Guo Yuan[[/b]]\\nConsummate Professional\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_fire}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]] Guo Yuan remains unshaken and unflappable no matter what he sees, and is the type to never lose his head.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Deng Sheng[[/b]]\\nTenacious Defender\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_fire}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]This general will not take a single step back, even if it costs him his very life.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Xia Zhao[[/b]]\\nBulwark of Gu Pass\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_metal}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Soldiers, no matter what comes through that gate, you will stand your ground![[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Zuozhi Zhulan[[/b]]\\nMatriarch of the Mountains\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_metal}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]This lady of the Heishan Mountains knows that the hilltops, crevices and valleys are akin to cribs and cradles, that must be protected at all costs.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Liu Bao[[/b]]\\nThe Tuqi King\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_earth}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Claiming distant descent from the Han Imperial line through the old system of princesses being sent to the Xiongnu as tribute wives, the dynamic Liu Bao patiently awaits for his family to make a mark on history.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Huchuquan[[/b]]\\nThe Last Chanyu\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_earth}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Even after suffering indignity and humiliation, the proud Xiongnu people continue to endure.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Qubei[[/b]]\\nThe Virtuous Prince\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_earth}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]This son of Qiangqu commands respect from fellow Xiongnu and Han officials alike.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Tadun[[/b]]\\nThe Storm of the Steppe\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_fire}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Commanding a vast coalition that spreads far across the northern steppes, Tadun's name carries fear and respect to friends and foes alike.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Leipan[[/b]]\\nThe Wolf Prince\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_fire}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]This young cub of the Wuhuan tribes seeks to prove himself in battle and warfare, so that he may one day command his people as his father once did before him.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Nanlou[[/b]]\\nThe Howling Wolf\\n\\nGeneral type: {tr:3k_general_type_fire}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Nanlou thanklessly strives to ensure the survival of his pack, even when facing disaster.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Supuyan[[/b]]\\nFarseeing Chieftain\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_fire}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Amongst his fellow Wuhuan leaders, Supuyan stands out as being one to recognise the value of forging alliances with and winning the support of the southern warlords of the Han.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Wuyan[[/b]]\\nThe Scourge of Liaoxi\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_fire}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]With almost frenzied ferocity, Wuyan recklessly rushes at anyone he even slightly believes to be a worthy challenge.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Wangdong[[/b]]\\nLiucheng Defender\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_fire}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Wangdong has sworn to protect the flank of the Wuhuan tribes, no matter what force comes against him.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Gurudun[[/b]]\\nWuhuan Vanguard\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_fire}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]This rider leads his horsemen from the front, and seeks nothing less than the first kill in each battle.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Gujin[[/b]]\\nDaling River Raider\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_fire}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]The fertile shores of the Daling river possesses bounties and treasure that this warrior believes will bring great prosperity to the Wuhuan.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Tian Chou[[/b]]\\nIntrepid Pathfinder\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_water}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Those who know war also know that the layout of the land and the terrain is often the key to success and victory.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Wei You[[/b]]\\nAdvocate of Pacifism \\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_water}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Taking a moral stand and refusing to sully your hands with violence is commendable in times of peace, but foolish in times of war.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Liu He[[/b]]\\nHapless Heir\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_water}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Being a scion to a royal house can unfortunately mean your fate is under the control of other parties.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Xianyu Fu[[/b]]\\nAvenging Warrior\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_fire}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Crossing this one's friends, family or faction can earn a grudge than can last a lifetime.[[/col]][[/i]]
[[b]]Xianyu Yin[[/b]]\\nCourageous Cavalier\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_wood}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]No distance is too far to ride for the loyal Xianyu Yin.[[/col]][[/i]]
[[b]]Tong Yurui[[/b]]\\nGenial and Acute\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_water}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]This one is a master of charming and shrewd conversation.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Zhou Ang[[/b]]\\nMilitant Adminstrator\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_earth}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Even when serving in an administrative role, Zhou Ang knows full well the importance of a well mustered militia and a well stocked armoury.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Lady Wang Liting[[/b]]\\nPersistent Seeker\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_metal}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Yijian Liting’s eyes never rest. She is always aware of her enemy’s movements.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Nie Tingping[[/b]]\\nMatriarch of Liaodong\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_metal}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Lady Nie strives to advance the fortunes of her husband and children, above all else.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Chen Deng[[/b]]\\nMan For All Seasons\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_water}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Sometimes, just sometimes, power fails to corrupt, and instead leads to altruism and charity.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Chen Su[[/b]]\\nLiving Legacy\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_water}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]You can call it inherited ability or mere nepotism, depending on the level of your cynicism.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Lady Ze Deng[[/b]]\\nSeeker of Riches\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_metal}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]This one has a single goal that is rather simple to understand - she seeks to accumulate vast amounts of wealth for herself, and her family.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Yu Minxiang[[/b]]\\nGem of Jianwei\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_earth}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]This respected lady comes from a local clan well versed in the politics of Jianwei, and hold strategic and political interests on both banks of the river.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Lu Jun[[/b]]\\nGentleman Cadet\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_earth}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]If one wishes to learn the intricacies of gentlemanly behaviour, one need look no further.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Lu Jun[[/b]]\\nGentleman Cadet\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_earth}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]If one wishes to learn the intricacies of gentlemanly behaviour, one need look no further.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Lu Shang[[/b]]\\nCourageous Kinsman\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_fire}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]This one earned merits at a young age for his bravery and defiance when faced with adversary.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]QIianman[[/b]]\\nThe Xianbei Prince\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_metal}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]This chieftain is the heir to Tanshihuai's legacy, and dreams to rebuild the mighty confederation of his grandfather.[[/col]][[/i]]
[[b]]Huang Wan[[/b]]\\nModel Minister\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_water}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Huang Wan is the very model of a modern minister general.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Zong Cheng[[/b]]\\nUpstanding Moralist\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_water}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]A man of truly pure character will refuse to be recruited by a regime they do not believe in, even if it puts them at personal risk.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Xu Jing[[/b]]\\nWandering Scholar\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_water}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Amongst the storms of chaos engulfing the land, Xu Jing is one of many scholar attempting to find a place of safe refuge. [[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Zhou Xin[[/b]]\\nThe Lance of the South\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_fire}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Tales of Zhou Xin's bravery and capabilities have spread far beyond his homeland in the far south.[[/col]][[/i]]
[[b]]Cao Hong[[/b]]\\nThe Soaring Eagle\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_wood}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]The world can do without Cao Hong, but it cannot do without Cao Cao![[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Cao Chun[[/b]]\\nTiger and Leopard Commander\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_fire}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]It is thanks to Cao Chun that the Tiger and Leopard cavalry are so famed and feared across the Central Plains.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Gao Lan[[/b]]\\nHebei's Finest\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_wood}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Of the myriad warriors and generals of the north, few can claim to possess either the prowess or ability of Gao Lan.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Zhang He[[/b]]\\nVanguard of Weinan\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_fire}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Zhang Heng's dynamic enthusiasm causes him to stand out even amongst the rest of Han Sui's Eight.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Sui Gu[[/b]]\\nVengeful Brigand\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_metal}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]A bandit Sui Gu may be, but his loyalty and sense of honour towards his lord are still commendable.[[/col]][[/i]]
[[b]]Yang Chou[[/b]]\\nKarmic Killer\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_water}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]To the traitorous, sometimes what goes around, comes around.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Yu Du[[/b]]\\nThe Poisoned Fang\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_fire}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]With venomous poison running through his veins, this one can kill with a touch.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Wang Dang[[/b]]\\nSnake in the Mountains\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_water}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]It would be wise to be cautious if one were to stray off the hillside path, lest one be struck down by a single bite.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Yan Gang[[/b]]\\nVanguard of White Horse Fellows\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_metal}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]With the thunder of hooves, the unmatchable charge of the infamous White Horse cavalry strikes fear into even the most stalwart of foes.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Gongsun Gong[[/b]]\\nNeutered Castrate\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_earth}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]An unfortunate and maligned illness has robbed this one of his virility and vigour. [[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Gongsun Kang[[/b]]\\nIndependent Trailblazer\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_earth}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Gongsun Kang will overcome all threats, whether internal or external, political or military, in order to maintain his firey independence.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Liang Mao[[/b]]\\nHonourable Hostage\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_water}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Liang Mao is willing to dispense with invaluable advice, even when threatened with blades and bondage.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Shi Yi[[/b]]\\nFrugal and Unflappable\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_water}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Humility and modesty are among the key tenets of being a respected Confucian gentleman.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Sun Shao[[/b]]\\nStoic Chancellor\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_metal}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Sun Shao may not shine brightly amongst his peers, but his reliability, efficiency and work behind the scenes are truly invaluable. [[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Zheng Yan[[/b]]\\nHumble and Filial\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_wood}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Being the only son of the famous Zheng Xuan carries certain expectations. Zheng Yan does not allow his family name to get to his head, and modestly acts as a good filial child should.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Sun Guan[[/b]]\\nBabyfaced Bandit\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_wood}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Let none dispute the Babyfaced Bandit's commitment and loyalty to his band of brothers, and to the people of Taishan.[[/col]][[/i]]
[[b]]Bao Xin[[/b]]\\nThe Hero of Jinan\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_metal}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Come, rebels, and taste the blade of Bao Xin![[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Cheng Yu[[/b]]\\nRuthless Pragmatist\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_water}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Cheng Yu knows that even the most unthinkable actions can become unavoidable in times of war.[[/col]][[/i]]
[[b]]Bao Xun[[/b]]\\nDefiant Critic\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_water}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]An acidic tongue rarely wins friends in an age of war.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Tao Ying[[/b]]\\nAn Unassuming Son\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_wood}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Many mediocre children in the land benefit greatly from nepotism. The mostly ignored Tao Ying is not one of them.[[/col]][[/i]]
[[b]]Zang Ba[[/b]]\\nCrafty Operator\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_wood}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Chaos is a ladder, and one Zang Ba is well equipped to climb.[[/col]][[/i]]
[[b]]Zhang Miao[[/b]]\\nFriend to All\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_water}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Zhang Miao has friends everywhere. It's a shame they all hate each other.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Zang Hong[[/b]]\\nDistinguished and Defiant\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_metal}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Zang Hong may outwardly appear to be a typically handsome and polite fellow, but this gentleman harbours a passionate fire within.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Huang She[[/b]]\\nThe Tides of Defiance\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_metal}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]This aggressive son of the Huang clan strikes out against his clan's adversaries with the force, and indeed, the predictablility of the tides.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Zhang Hu[[/b]]\\nNaval Specialist\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_metal}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Mastering the waterways of China takes years of training, this officer has reached a degree of expertise.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Su Fei[[/b]]\\nThe Coursing Corsair\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_fire}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Su Fei's knowledge of the riverways is only rivalled by his fierce loyalty to his friends.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Huang Chengyan[[/b]]\\nQuiet Recluse\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_water}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Amongst the maelstrom of chaos, there are some who attempt to carve out a humble life of peace and quiet.[[/col]][[/i]]
[[b]]Cai He[[/b]]\\nAspiring Agent\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_metal}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]For whatever reason, this nobleman fancies himself a spy, of sorts.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Chen Ying Z[[/b]]\\nHaughty Hurler\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_fire}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Chen Ying has an expertise in the use of throwing weapons, a niche that allows him to stand somewhat tall amongst other warriors.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Zhang Yun[[/b]]\\nResolute Admiral\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_water}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Zhang Yun commands fleets with a cool head, and knowledge of the flows of the water.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Zhao Fan[[/b]]\\nCanny Negotiatior\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_water}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Come, there is no need for violence! Let us share tea, and discuss this matter like gentlemen.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Liu Qi[[/b]]\\nFate's Ladder\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_earth}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Just as greatness lies just out of reach above, a disastrous downfall lurks below.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Liu Cong[[/b]]\\nPolitical Pawn\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_earth}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]The easy-going Liu Cong is happy enough to allow advisors and relatives more willful than he tell him exactly what to do.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Kuai Liang[[/b]]\\nThe Seeker of Compromise\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_water}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Unlike his brother, Kuai Liang prefers to keep his hands free of blood, and seeks a path of peace.[[/col]][[/i]]
[[b]]Kuai Yue[[/b]]\\nDuplicitious Mastermind\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_water}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]No ploy is too underhanded to further Kuai Yue's goals.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Zhang Fu[[/b]]\\nZhengyi Zealot\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_wood}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]The wars of the land mean little to Zhang Fu, who devotes his time to spreading his father's teachings, and raising alms for the poor.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Zhang Wei[[/b]]\\nGuardian of Hanning\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_earth}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Ever more a military mind than his theocratic brother, Zhang Wei strives to keep the peace and protect the followers of the Five Pecks sect.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Yang Bo[[/b]]\\nPetty and Jealous\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_metal}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]An envious and dissatisfied general can lead to the downfall of a state, if he is not dealt with.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Yan Pu[[/b]]\\nDevout Tactician\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_water}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]The primary calling for Yan Pu is the long term survival of the Five Pecks sect, even if it means persuasing his master to bend the knee.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Chen Chao[[/b]]\\nSichuan Loyalist\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_fire}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]We don't want any of those filthy easterners, coming to Yizhou, taking our jobs![[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Ren Qi[[/b]]\\nFerocious Firestarter\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_fire}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Consider this one the first to light the torches of war, and set alight the flames of rebellion.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Zhao Wei[[/b]]\\nDongzhou Defier\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_water}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Zhao Wei, a respected member of Yizhou's gentry, believes the province's fate should remain in the hands of the locals, and certainly should not be leveraged to violent refugees from the north.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Wu Kuang[[/b]]\\nDisciplined and Trustworthy\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_metal}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]The stern patriarch of the Wu clan has drilled important notions of loyalty and dignity into his younger relatives.[[/col]][[/i]]
[[b]]Zhang Ren[[/b]]\\nStaunch Guardian\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_fire}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Against the loyal Zhang Ren, not a single foe shall pass.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Yan Yan[[/b]]\\nThe Seasoned Administrator\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_metal}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Even as countless winters pass him by, Yan Yan is no less weathered.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Ma Wan[[/b]]\\nThe Sentinel of Liang\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_fire}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Allowing his fellow western warriors to charge, Ma Wan instead opts to hold the line.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Cheng Yi[[/b]]\\nBold Outrider\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_wood}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Often, caution will be tossed to the wind, when the position of foes needs to be scouted.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Liang Xing[[/b]]\\nBravo of Guanzhong\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_metal}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Whenever the western lands are in peril, Liang Xing shall always be there to answer the call to arms.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Gan Ji[[/b]]\\nIll-mannered Mystic\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_metal}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]You're getting cursed! And you're getting cursed, and you're getting cursed! Everyone here's getting cursed! [[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Huang Hua[[/b]]\\nThe Brash Ox\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_earth}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]The staunch and headstrong Huang Hua stands in defiance of any adversary - regardless of the wisdom of his decision.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Zhao Ang[[/b]]\\nIll-fortuned Patriarch\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_water}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Ordinary men often sadly have to endure lives of malaise and misfortune, when the gales of disharmony sweep the world.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Wei Kang[[/b]]\\nResilient Inspector\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_earth}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Even when the city is surrounded, even when the walls are stormed and the gates are breached, Wei Kang will hold the line, come what may.[[/col]][[/i]]
[[b]]Pang Yu[[/b]]\\nRighteous Avenger\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_wood}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]A man's convictions are only as sharp as his sword.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Zhao E[[/b]]\\nThe Dauntless Swordswoman\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_metal}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]The strong men of the Zhao family are dead, leaving only a weak daughter. I need not worry. - The last words of the murderous fool who crossed the brave Zhao E.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Zhang Meng[[/b]]\\nUnworthy Scion of Wuwei\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_fire}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Whilst the shrines and temples of his late father Zhang Huan are revered by the people of Wuwei, the less-than-worthy Zhang Meng does not enjoy such praise.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Suli[[/b]]\\nXianbei Tradesman\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_metal}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]This canny chief recognises the value of trade and diplomacy as being just as important as strength and warfare.[[/col]][[/i]]
[[b]]Tufa Pigu[[/b]]\\nThe Rampaging Boar\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_metal}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]None can stop the momentum of Tufa Pigu![[/col]][[/i]]
[[b]]Mike[[/b]]\\nDynamic Mike\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_metal}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Everyone has a plan until a Xianbei stabs you in the face.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Jueji[[/b]]\\nGregarious Bowman\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_metal}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]The jovial Jueji always has a jolly grin on his face, even when in the heat of battle.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Agui[[/b]]\\nUnshakable Headsman\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_wood}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Agui's stalwart resolve is as unmovable as the mighty mountains that he calls home.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Qiang Duan[[/b]]\\nOf Lofty Peaks\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_wood}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]The mountains and plateaus of China are home to some of the most rugged, fiercely independent and ferocious warriors imaginable.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Yang Qianwan[[/b]]\\nThe Vertiginous Quake\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_wood}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]The very ground trembles before the tenacious prowess of Yang Qianwan![[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Chen Dao[[/b]]\\nWhite Feathered General\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_earth}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]With a distinctive plume of white and a majestic countenance, Chen Dao strikes a dashing figure on the battlefield.[[/col]][[/i]]
[[b]]Wang Yi[[/b]]\\nWoman Scorned\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_earth}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Woe betide any man who dare cross Wang Yi or her family. [[/col]][[/i]]
[[b]]Budugen[[/b]]\\nFierce Raider\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_metal}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]With bow and blade, Budugen terrorizes the people of the frontier.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Chenglugui[[/b]]\\nTribal Diplomat\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_metal}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Maintaining good relations and trade between the various northern clans and tribes is essential to establish any form of cohesion and cooperation.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Fulohan[[/b]]\\nFurious Bladesman\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_metal}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]The warriors of the Xianbei are renowned for being far more ferocious and tenacious than even the best of the Xiongnu and Wuhuan.[[/col]][[/i]]
[[b]]Kebineng[[/b]]\\nThe Indomitable Flame\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_metal}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]With 100,000 riders at his back, Kebineng sets the north ablaze.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Mohuba[[/b]]\\nBorn In The Saddle\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_metal}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Many of the steppe riders learned how to ride almost before they learned how to walk.[[/col]][[/i]]
[[b]]Xun Yu[[/b]]\\nHegemon's Aide\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_water}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]"Here comes my Zifang!"[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Han Hao[[/b]]\\nFeeder of Armies\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_wood}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]A courageous warrior and an adept agriculturalist, Han Hao is a valuable asset.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Xu Huang[[/b]]\\nGuardian of the Gates\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_metal}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]When assigned to guardianship, Xu Huang is an immovable sentinel, requiring a tremendous effort to bypass.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Zhang Fang[[/b]]\\nPrince of Black Mountain\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_earth}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]When fighting for his master, Zhang Fang is not known to concern himself with scruples like 'civilian casualties'[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Gongsun Xu[[/b]]\\nBrave General\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_metal}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Gongsun Xu combines the tactical mind of a strategist, with the bravery and duty of a man who has risked his life on the frontlines countless times.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Wang Xiu[[/b]]\\nThe Righteous Hero\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_earth}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Never can it be said that Wang Xiu was ever disloyal, dishonourable or unwilling to come to the aid of those he serves.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Yu Jin[[/b]]\\nEnforcer of the Law\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_metal}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]As an imperious, by-the-book disciplinarian, Yu Jin rules his subordinates with fear and drilled-in obedience.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Mi Zhu[[/b]]\\nDependable Administrator\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_water}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]In these interesting times of fluctuating allegiances, the steadfast loyalty of Mi Zhu can always be relied upon.[[/col]][[/i]]
[[b]]Sun Qian[[/b]]\\nUpstanding Loyalist\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_water}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Sun Qian’s word is an unwavering bond.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Lu Xun[[/b]]\\nScholar General\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_water}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Equal parts brains and brawn, Lu Xun can oversee both civil and military matters.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Han Xian[[/b]]\\nWhite Wave Veteran\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_water}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Many battles – and many lives – have passed before the eyes of this grizzled bandit.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]] Huang Yueying[[/b]]\\nThe Dragon's Aide\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_wood}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]As the rising dragon soars, this one does all she can to assist his ascent to the heavens.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]] Wang Fangyue[[/b]]\\nSeductive Whisperer\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_water}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Lady Wang Fangyue attempts to get her father's entire court to dance to her tune.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]] Zhang Yanyan[[/b]]\\nJewel of Bingzhou\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_earth}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]The favourite daughter of Zhang Yang finds herself often at odds with her siblings, as they compete for the affection and attention of their father.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]] Ze Yue[[/b]]\\nSubtle Trickster\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_metal}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Ze Yue helps further her family's cause through her skills at manipulation and trickery.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]] Zhang Zhumeng[[/b]]\\nCharming Hostess\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_metal}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]With a polite smile and pleasant conversation, this lady knows how to keep her guests well looked after.[[/col]][[/i]]
[[b]]Han Tong[[/b]]\\nScion of Ye\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_wood}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Sometimes, aiding one's father can prove to be a task truly insurmountable.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Ze Bu[[/b]]\\nSeizer of Donations\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_wood}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]When the locals are reluctant to present their tribute, this one is sent to ensure they are more "charitable."[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Han Xin[[/b]]\\nEnvoy to the Qiang\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_fire}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]This son of Han Sui serves his father by performing as a liason to the myriad western tribes and clans.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Yang Wanwan[[/b]]\\nThe Prowling Tigress\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_wood}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]This princess of the Di people proves that she is every bit as capable and deadly as any man of her clan.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Lian Zhi[[/b]]\\nGentle Peacekeeper\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_earth}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]The dutiful wife of Liu Yu is a lady who prefers negotiation and diplomacy to war and bloodshed.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Nie Tingping[[/b]]\\nMatriarch of Liaodong\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_metal}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Lady Nie strives to advance the fortunes of her husband and children, above all else.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Zhang Gong[[/b]]\\nThe Forthcoming Arbiter\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_wood}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Those of true character and loyalty stay the course through thick and thin. [[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Yang Feng[[/b]]\\nValliant Youxia\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_fire}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]When law and order break down, wandering swordsmen take up arms with their own mantle of justice, be that for good or ill.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Su Ze[[/b]]\\nThe Pearl of the West\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_water}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Between allying with tribes, reopening trade, putting down rebellions and advising the court, Su Ze is an official of truly tireless efforts.[[/col]][[/i]]
